short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for transparent background images easily in google by including "png" in your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension causes all google image searches with the text "png" included in the search to automatically enable the "search for color: transparent" feature in google image search. This is handy because google image searches for logos and clipart and the like are riddled with fake pngs and solid backgrounds.
